name: aliexpress.solution.merchant.profile.get
description: API for oversea sellers to obtain the normal information, e.g. store id, registration country code.

responseParams.name: country_code
responseParams.description: country code which the merchant chose when registered

responseParams.name: product_posting_forbidden
responseParams.description: Indicate whether the mechant could post product or not. FALSE means the merchant could normally post product.
